title: Kim Jong Un demands major health sector ‘reform’ at Pyongyang hospital opening | NK News
snippet: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un severely criticized the country’s Ministry of Public Health and called for health sector “reform” at the opening ceremony for the Pyongyang General Hospital on Monday, according to state media.

title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform - Wikipedia
snippet: The Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform (MSPRH) is the health ministry of Republic of Algeria. It is located in El Madania, a municipality of Algiers. The Ministry is responsible for public health facilities and population monitoring. The Minister is a member of the Council of ...
